scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && sass src/styles/main.scss:dist/styles.css --no-source-map && cpx src/views/* dist && cpx 'src/assets/*' dist/assets
scripts.build:watch: mkdir -p dist && sass src/styles/main.scss:dist/styles.css --watch & cpx src/views/* dist --watch & cpx 'src/assets/*' dist/assets --watch
